attributes.name: activeid
attributes.title: Active ID
attributes.description: The HTML ID of the active tab

slots.name: tab
slots.title: Tab slot
slots.description: Slotted tabs are rendered and associated to their respective tab panel by their order in the DOM

slots.name: tabpanel
slots.title: Tabpanel slot
slots.description: Slotted tab panels are rendered and associated to their respective tabs by their order in the DOM

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the tablist

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the tablist
